Title: Silk Scavenging
Description:
Hello friend! You're a tailor, right? So you must know about silk!

Mister Rossmar down in Loamm knows how to make special silk from the cocoons of the Underlight Moths, but could use some help gathering them up! 

You should be able to find them in the mushroomy area near Glimmerogg. I'll sure he will make it worth your while!
ObjectivesText: Collect 10 Underlight Cocoons Fibers in Zaralek Cavern.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Rossmar in Loamm
